sys_script_include.description: A function to process large amounts of records using a callback function. The function makes use of a specified date/time field to determine which record to process next. Multiple instances of a background script can run using this function to work on large amounts of records in a table without interfering with each other. For large tables it is imperative to add an index on the date time field!
sys_script_include.name: RecordBulkProcessor
